short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classify text as AI or Human generated and check for toxicity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fake-berry

Fake-berry is our pilot project designed to help users identify the origin of text and assess its toxicity. Once installed, users can simply copy any text to determine whether it was generated by a human or AI. Additionally, Fake-berry provides a toxicity score for the text, offering valuable insights into its content.
